citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Bifidobacterium thermacidophilum subsp. thermacidophilum subsp. nov.
All strains meet the species description.
l-Arabinose, inulin and d-mannose are fermented.
Fermentation products from glucose are acetic and lactic acids at a molar ratio of 2·46–2·72 : 1.
The type strain, 36T (=AS 1.2282T=LMG 21395T), was isolated from wastewater.
